title: Timeline Significance Schema
description: Standardized enumeration of significance levels for timeline events in The Shadow Team Chronicles universe.

descriptions.description: Detailed explanations of each significance level (not part of the enum, provided for documentation)

world_changing.description: Event fundamentally alters the course of history on a global or interplanetary scale, affecting most aspects of civilization.

major.description: Event has far-reaching consequences for multiple regions, cultures, or organizations, with long-lasting effects.

significant.description: Event substantially impacts a specific region, organization, or demographic, with effects lasting for generations.

moderate.description: Event has notable impact on local affairs with consequences that last for years or decades.

minor.description: Event has limited scope but still warrants inclusion in historical records due to its relevance to specific groups or later developments.

local_impact.description: Event primarily affects a small area, community, or organization with little wider impact, but provides important context.

personal.description: Event primarily concerns individual characters but is included in the timeline due to those characters' importance to broader narrative arcs.

visualPriority.description: Suggested rendering importance when displaying timeline events (not part of the enum, provided for documentation)
